Text:
Rerunning dedup while there are still duplicates can cause double duplicates.
(Though, not sure if that isn't actually  the right way to go)

Parallelize image comparison
Needs different Image-Comparison tool. Can't use winforms images because of GDI
Make duplicate list a hashset or something
Auto scroll doesn't work on start
Save state when deduplicating so we can continue (load) after restart
Rename VidepDedup to VideoDedupClient
Switch to .net 5.0
Fix VS Configurations f√ºr x64 und x86
Implement CI
Replace this ToDo list with github project
Fix style guide for internal protected members
Run dedup as service, monitoring the folder for changed of video files.

Try reading all images from a video at once (to get a single ffmpeg call maybe)
https://stackoverflow.com/a/28321986/2347040
Getting exception when opening server configuration while server is not running
Remove relativeFilePath from VideoFile and load server config instead when resolving duplicates
Remove timer on client or implement progress time counting on server
Make WCF static functions in Console.Program internal instead of public
Implement Log as virtual DGV
HashSet for NewFiles in DedupEngine?
Set WindowPosition for ClientConfigDlg
Add monitoring option in config (to turn off or on)
Update current status when monitoring and new files have been found (and are being checked)
Fix flickering in FileComparisonDlg
Downscale thumbnails
Convert thumbnails to jpeg
VideoFile Interface for regular and serializable thumbnails
Add discard button to main form
Add discard button to comparison form

Exception in DurationSelection when only two videos and restarting a finished comparison.
(The value of the slider will be set to maxvalue + 1, which causes exception...)
DurationSelection MaxDuration is exclusive. When having only two videos, the longest will be excluded since MaxDuration is not bigger.
Configurable compare (Max difference in duration and Thumbnail count with max accepted differernt thumbnails)

Race Condition when resolving duplicates while one of the files is being used to find duplicates. They both use the Thumbnails at the same time.
(The actual thumbnails, not the Collection. Same issue when cancelling and while doing so, resolving a file whose thumbnails are being disposed.)
LblCurrentFile no autosize but or at least max width to form width (to cut it off properly at the right side instead of falling out of the dialog)
On Cancel, discard all thumbnails (in gui thread to be thread safe! Or sync? Or use IDisposable?)
Change Tray Icon when duplicates are found
Duration formatting in main dlg without second fractions
Highlight larger file in comparison dialog
Minimize to tray?

Update status info when resolving a duplicate. To update the duplicate count there.
(Should keep the currently processed file information on there, when it's still searching for duplicates.)
Add Icons
Add progress to taskbar (https://stackoverflow.com/a/28391274/2347040)
Less invoking of gui thread

Skip with 2 duplicates reshows the first one (because the first one is removed from the list, placed at the end and the index is increased...
We should not increase the index in that case. Or just not move it to the end...)
Add continuation? Setting a minimum duration? maximum duration?
Cancellable media information gatherino
Add timer to show for how long we are dedupping
Add file ending configuration
make delete button set dialog result manually (so in case of exception, it won't close)
Make delete button cancel thubnail loading
move compare dlg buttons to the outside instead of the inside
make compare dlg window fullscreen
Don't load all thumbnails beforehand. Load them on demand. So that 2 completely different thumbnails will avoid loading the others.
Cache MediaInfo (And Thumbnails?)
Cache can contain more files than actually exist
Load thumbnails in comparison dialog lazy
Resolve conflicts while searching for deduplications
Update readme
